abstract: JPMorgan Chase said it hired a senior Merrill Lynch deal-maker as its new vice chairman of mergers and acquisitions, the latest in a reshuffling of investment banking ranks.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase said it hired a senior Merrill Lynch deal-maker as its new vice chairman of mergers and acquisitions, the latest in a reshuffling of investment banking ranks.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase said Thursday that it had hired a senior Merrill Lynch deal maker as its new vice chairman of mergers and acquisitions, the latest in a reshuffling of the investment banking ranks since the onset of the financial crisis.

headline.main: JPMorgan Hires Senior Merrill Deal Maker
